name: Temple Delve
description:
A platformer through moss covered ruins!

Make it through to the treasure at the end, collecting the necessary keys along the way. See how many gems you can gather!

The whole experience should not take more than 40 minutes, but should be cleared through speed runs in around 20 minutes.

In  terms of hardware, this game is unlikely to run on a simple notepad with basic processors and graphic cards. If you have any gaming laptops or PCs, it should run well. The game was tested to run on RTX 2070, and RTX 2060S, so anything close or equivalent should be capable.

All the environment props were made by me, and credits, where required, are given in-game.

The game is free, but donations would be a most gracious gesture!

Developed with Unreal Engine 4
